Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Shokaract arives near the Alliance base and aims his gatling gun. Deemos mo=
ves next to Shokaract.

"And your confident that we outnumber them?" Deemos=
 says.

"I'm positive. Unless they happen to be wusses and bring along al o=
f their little Maximal and Predacon friends." Shokaract says. Deemos looks =
behind him to find that Rizopas and Serge were missing.

"They must be wait=
ing for Sharpedge, let's wait, Shokaract, we need all the help we can get, =
that base has some good defenses." Deemos says. Shokaract backs off. (I'm w=
aiting for Alloran, honestly) Deemos calls Rizopas and serge on his commlin=
k. They were back behind and floating in a stream.

"All of the peacefulnes=
s, Serge, when everyone is scared of ya, you just have peace." Rizopas says=
. Serge responds with a growl and gulps down about 10 gallons of water at o=
nce.

"Wouldn't it be nice if the stars were out? You know, if it was night=
 time?" Rizopas says. Serge looks to the sky.

"The water is perfect, not t=
oo hot or cold." Rizopas says. Serge looks down at the water.

"Me and you =
could make a good team, Serge, during the battle we could work together." R=
izopas says. Serge blinks...
